title: Droven bolt
data:
- *For the weapon in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), see [dark elven crossbow bolt](/wiki/Dark_elven_crossbow_bolt "Dark elven crossbow bolt").*

| ) [File:Droven crossbow bolt.png](/index.php?title=Special:Upload\&wpDestFile=Droven_crossbow_bolt.png "File:Droven crossbow bolt.png") |                                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| Name                                                                                                                                    | droven crossbow bolt                                   |
| Appearance                                                                                                                              | spider-emblemed crossbow                               |
| Damage vs. small                                                                                                                        | 1d9+1                                                  |
| Damage vs. large                                                                                                                        | 1d6+1                                                  |
| To-hit bonus                                                                                                                            | +8                                                     |
| Weapon skill                                                                                                                            | [crossbow](/wiki/Crossbow "Crossbow")                  |
| Size                                                                                                                                    | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")            |
| Base price                                                                                                                              | 2 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                                                                                  | [1](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                             |
| Material                                                                                                                                | [obsidian](/wiki/Obsidian "Obsidian")                  |

A **droven bolt** is a type of [weapon](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"). It is a [stackable](/wiki/Stackable "Stackable") [projectile](/wiki/Projectile "Projectile") designed for use with [droven crossbows](/wiki/Droven_crossbow "Droven crossbow"), and uses the [crossbow](/wiki/Crossbow "Crossbow") [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill"). It has a [default material](/wiki/Object_materials_\(dNetHack\) "Object materials (dNetHack)") of [obsidian](/wiki/Obsidian "Obsidian"), and appears as a "[crossbow bolt](/wiki/Crossbow_bolt "Crossbow bolt")" when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification").

## Generation

Droven bolts are not randomly generated. [Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\)#dNetHack "Drow (starting race)") [heroes](/wiki/Hero "Hero") start with knowledge of droven plate mail, and drow [Rangers](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger") will receive a droven crossbow and bolts in place of the role's standard [bow](/wiki/Bow "Bow") and [arrows](/wiki/Arrow "Arrow").

[Drow matrons](/wiki/Drow_matron "Drow matron"), [drow matron-mothers](/wiki/Drow_matron-mother "Drow matron-mother"), and [yochlol](/wiki/Yochlol "Yochlol") generated in unearthly drow form are [always generated with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a droven crossbow and a stack of 12-36 droven bolts. [Y-cultist fighters](/index.php?title=Y-cultist_fighter\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Y-cultist fighter (page does not exist)") and other [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(monster_attribute\) "Drow (monster attribute)") that do not have a defined starting inventory have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a droven crossbow and a stack of 12-36 droven bolts. [Driders](/wiki/Drider_\(dNetHack\) "Drider (dNetHack)") always generate with 10-30 droven bolts for their droven crossbow, as are [deminymphs](/wiki/Deminymph "Deminymph") that are generated with a "Black Web" kit.

Droven bolts generated in the inventory of drow monsters are always [sleep](/wiki/Sleep "Sleep")-poisoned.

[Liecleaver](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Liecleaver "DNetHack artifacts") and [Wrathful Spider](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Wrathful_Spider "DNetHack artifacts") can be [invoked](/wiki/Invoked "Invoked") to [generate a small stack of droven bolts](/wiki/Create_ammo "Create ammo").

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Droven_bolt\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Droven bolt

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For the weapon in EvilHack, see dark elven crossbow bolt.
) File:Droven crossbow bolt.png
Name droven crossbow bolt
Appearance spider-emblemed crossbow
Damage vs. small 1d9+1
Damage vs. large 1d6+1
To-hit bonus +8
Weapon skill crossbow
Size one-handed
Base price 2 zm
(+10/positive
enchant)
Weight 1
Material obsidian

A droven bolt is a type of weapon that appears in dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack. It is a stackable projectile designed for use with droven crossbows, and uses the crossbow skill. It has a default material of obsidian, and appears as a "crossbow bolt" when unidentified.

Generation

Droven bolts are not randomly generated. Drow heroes start with knowledge of droven plate mail, and drow Rangers will receive a droven crossbow and bolts in place of the role's standard bow and arrows.

Drow matrons, drow matron-mothers, and yochlol generated in unearthly drow form are always generated with a droven crossbow and a stack of 12-36 droven bolts. Y-cultist fighters and other drow that do not have a defined starting inventory have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a droven crossbow and a stack of 12-36 droven bolts. Driders always generate with 10-30 droven bolts for their droven crossbow, as are deminymphs that are generated with a "Black Web" kit.

Droven bolts generated in the inventory of drow monsters are always sleep-poisoned.

Liecleaver and Wrathful Spider can be invoked to generate a small stack of droven bolts.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Droven_bolt&oldid=172845"

A '''droven bolt''' is a type of [[weapon]] that appears in [[dNetHack]], [[notdNetHack]] and [[notnotdNetHack]]. It is a [[stackable]] [[projectile]] designed for use with [[droven crossbow]]s, and uses the [[crossbow]] [[skill]]. It has a [[Object materials (dNetHack)|default material]] of [[obsidian]], and appears as a "[[crossbow bolt]]" when [[Identification|unidentified]].

==Generation==
Droven bolts are not randomly generated. [[Drow (starting race)#dNetHack|Drow]] [[hero]]es start with knowledge of droven plate mail, and drow [[Ranger]]s will receive a droven crossbow and bolts in place of the role's standard [[bow]] and [[arrow]]s.

[[Drow matron]]s, [[drow matron-mother]]s, and [[yochlol]] generated in unearthly drow form are [[Monster starting inventory|always generated with]] a droven crossbow and a stack of 12-36 droven bolts. [[Y-cultist fighter]]s and other [[Drow (monster attribute)|drow]] that do not have a defined starting inventory have a {{frac|3}} chance of generating with a droven crossbow and a stack of 12-36 droven bolts. [[Drider (dNetHack)|Driders]] always generate with 10-30 droven bolts for their droven crossbow, as are [[deminymph]]s that are generated with a "Black Web" kit.

Droven bolts generated in the inventory of drow monsters are always [[sleep]]-poisoned.

[[dNetHack artifacts#Liecleaver|Liecleaver]] and [[dNetHack artifacts#Wrathful Spider|Wrathful Spider]] can be [[invoked]] to [[Create ammo|generate a small stack of droven bolts]].
